strong: New York, New York (Remote due to COVID)

p.5: We are seeking an individual to work with a Fortune 50 Broadcast Media & Entertainment leader located in New York City. As a Software Developer, you will be responsible for managing, improving and building the next generation of data tools and frameworks, in addition to developing and maintaining data products & infrastructure. In this role, you will also have to the opportunity to deliver on real-time data to a variety of the largest media companies in the world.

li: Bachelor=E2=80=99s degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field
li.1: 1+ years of experience of writing code in either Python, Java or Scala
li.2: Experience with SQL and other Relational Data Bases required
li.3: 1+ years of experience of hands-on work in the field of Software Development or Big Data
li.4: Understanding of technology principles and work methods (Agile, Scrum, etc.)
li.5: Experience in being versatile and the ability to be a problem solver
li.6: Aptitude to learn and grow in new cloud technologies
li.7: Experience or exposure with AWS services a plus

li: Extensively use a combination of cutting-edge AWS services, 3rd party commercial software, and internally developed software to design and implement data pipelines, building scalable and optimized enterprise data systems
li.1: Manage, improve, and build the next generation of data tools and frameworks, in addition to developing and supporting data products and infrastructure
li.2: Develop in-house tools to automate common tasks
li.3: Work with languages like Java, Scala, Python, Bash, and SQL to wrangle vast amounts of data
li.4: Share learnings with wider engineering teams by doing technical demos

li: Working for a well-known, globally leading Media Streaming organization
li.1: Exposure to high-level business professionals in a variety of departments and geographic locations
li.2: On-site hands on training and technical upskilling with cutting-edge tools and technology
li.3: Opportunity to work and grow your career in fast-paced environment
